description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Chicken Salad with Mango recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Chicken Salad with Mango Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle with remaining dressing and top with peanuts. Tip 1: You can replace the chicken and marinade with smoked chicken for a cold quick salad. Tip 2: Leftover chicken is great in wraps for the lunch box with sliced apple and cheddar. Tip 3: You can replace beans with snow peas and sugar snap peas in this salad.
